title: Mr. Wizards World - 32 Episodes [XviD]
description:
*******************************************************************************
                               Mr Wizard's World
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: TV Program



Video Format.........: XviD
Video Bitrate........: Various (around 830-875)
Resolution...........: Various (448x336 - 528x400)

32 Episodes from 8 DVD's. Each file is around 175mb. I am pretty sure that most 
if not all of these episodes are from the 80's.

Be careful, i tried the episode 21 handkerchief experiment in the 80's. My 
mother wasn't pleased that i was trying to light an alcohol laden handkerchief 
in her living room.
